Houston.Davies College of Business:
The Davies College of Business is the business school of the University of Houston–Downtown (UHD), with programs fully accredited by the AACSB International. It is one of four academic units at UHD housed in the 150,000-square-foot (14,000 m2) Shea Street Building.


== Departments and programs ==
The Davies College of Business offers an MBA designed for working professionals, enabling them to continue their careers while earning an advanced business education.
